review: Had severe toothache and called doc imm. Was given the earliest appt in the morn and my problem was attended to. I underwent root canal treatment and at every stage was explained by the doc of the process.  Dr. Rajiv handled the damaged tooth with extreme care and patience. After 3 months, I feel no pain. Also, a few fillings and cleaning of the teeth was done very smoothly. I have just to say that doctors like Rajiv are " God Incarnate". I genuinely recommend him and am sure you will have the same opinion  about him. God Bless you, Dr. Rajiv.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Having a set of badly messed up teeth, I was quite apprehensive about being to a dentist. But since I did not  have a choice, and this doctor was kind|brave enough to take in patients during the Covid period, I paid a visit. First good thing was that he did not insist on a root canal unlike many other dentists, instead he gave me both options(extraction or root canal) and left the choice to me. He made me understand the pros and cons of both and helped me make the decision. The doctor was extremely gentle with the whole procedure that made it pain free. Even though he did explain what was being done, he did not divulge too much detail, which would make me nervous otherwise! Done with my root canal and I am so grateful that my tooth is restored! I would definitely recommend this doctor.
